plot: Alan is in for the weirdest day of his life when he returns home from a party and goes for a drink. He finds a bottle of LimboJuice in the fridge...but it proves a challenge to keep a hold of the bottle.
title: Bottle
plot_es: Alan is in for the weirdest day of his life when he returns home from a party and goes for a drink. He finds a bottle of LimboJuice in the fridge...but it proves a challenge to keep a hold of the bottle.
plot_en: Alan is in for the weirdest day of his life when he returns home from a party and goes for a drink. He finds a bottle of LimboJuice in the fridge...but it proves a challenge to keep a hold of the bottle.
